13/* Route to standard, and FPBench-specific, math functions */
14#ifndef TH_MATH_H
15#define TH_MATH_H
16
17/* Standard math functions and constants */
18#if USE_MATH_H
19#include <math.h>
20#ifdef _MSC_VER
21#include <float.h>
22#endif
23#endif
24
25/* Configuration */
26#include "th_cfg.h"
27#include "th_types.h"
28
29/* Route to math functions for DP configuration */
30#if USE_FP64
31#define th_cos cos
32#define th_cosh cosh
33#define th_exp exp
34#define th_fabs fabs
35#define th_floor floor
36#define th_ln log
37#define th_log10 log10
38#define th_pow pow
39#define th_sin sin
40#define th_sinh sinh
41#define th_sqrt sqrt
42#define th_tan tan
43#define th_tanh tanh
44#define th_atan atan
45#endif
46
47#define th_pow_64 pow
48
49/* Route to math functions for SP configuration */
50#if USE_FP32
51#define th_cos cosf
52#define th_cosh coshf
53#define th_exp expf
54#define th_fabs fabsf
55#define th_floor floorf
56#define th_ln logf
57#define th_log10 log10f
58#define th_pow powf
59#define th_sin sinf
60#define th_sinh sinhf
61#define th_sqrt sqrtf
62#define th_tan tanf
63#define th_tanh tanhf
64#define th_atan atanf
65#endif
66
67/* FPBench-specific constants */
68#define EE_PI FPCONST(3.1415926535897932)
69#if USE_FP64
70 #define EE_MININI FPCONST(1.0e100)
71 #define EE_MAXINI FPCONST(-1.0e100)
72 #define EE_EPSINI FPCONST(1.0e-100)
73 #define EE_EPSILON FPCONST(1.0e-50)
74#endif
75#if USE_FP32
76 #define EE_MININI FPCONST(1.0e38)
77 #define EE_MAXINI FPCONST(-1.0e38)
78 #define EE_EPSINI FPCONST(1.0e-37)
79 #define EE_EPSILON EE_EPSINI
80#endif
81
82/* FPBench-specific functions */
83/* The test harness is th_isfinite function needs to provide a method that will detect if a number is not infinite and not denormal */
84/* implementation using fpclass(ify) for gcc and MSVC is provided. */
85/* Use AL_ISFINITE to provide your own implementation if fpclass(ify) is not available on your platform. */
86#if AL_ISFINITE
87 #if USE_FP64
88 int al_isfinite_dp(e_f64 x);
89 #define th_isfinite al_isfinite_dp
90 #endif
91 #if USE_FP32
92 int al_isfinite_sp(e_f32 x);
93 #define th_isfinite al_isfinite_sp
94 #endif
95#else
96#ifdef _MSC_VER
97#define th_isfinite(x) \
98 ((_fpclass(x) == _FPCLASS_PZ) || (_fpclass(x) == _FPCLASS_NZ) || \
99 (_fpclass(x) == _FPCLASS_PN) || (_fpclass(x) == _FPCLASS_NN))
100#else
101#define th_isfinite(x) \
102 ((fpclassify(x) == FP_NORMAL) || (fpclassify(x) == FP_ZERO))
103#endif
104#endif
105
106#define th_log10_f64 log10
107/* As per WG decision, do not allow non-std sincos builtin */
108#define HAVE_SINCOS 0
109void th_sincos(e_fp x,e_fp *s,e_fp *c);
110
111#endif /*TH_MATH_H*/
